products.title: Truth White Perfect Fit
products.description: This truth perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Real Wood Almond White Perfect Fit
products.description: The almond white perfect fit works well with tones of grey, mushroom and stone, adding a dash of light cream to a room to balance darker furnishings. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Galena Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Their real wood perfect fits are designed to match their real wood venetian blinds, for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The venetian slats will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Real Wood Obsidian Perfect Fit
products.description: Obsidian is volcanic glass and is one of the blackest substances on earth. This matte black offers the same light-swallowing impact of obsidian, in a stylish perfect fit frame. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Sandstone White Perfect Fit
products.description: A slightly less intense white than their real wood lightbox white, this sandstone white gives a clean feel to any room. Can be used to make a subtle contrast to white walls, or as a statement piece with other neutral tones. Perfect for windows such as those within conservatories or with protruding handles. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Double Cream Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in double cream gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Perforated Grey Aluminium Perfect Fit
products.description: Perforated slats on aluminium perfect fit blinds shield your room from the full glare of the sun, whilst still allowing you to see out. Designed for high-sunlight rooms such as conservatories, they're a hardwearing blind that provides gentle sun filtering, even when closed struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Rock Salt Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: The rock salt perfect fit is an elegant pearl white tone with an understated satin finish. Being an off-white shade, it has stunning versatility in matching decors, softly contrasting with grey or beige walls or sharpening more colourful schemes. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Soy Milk Matt Perfect Fit
products.description: Choose soy milk matte for an organic shade that pairs beautifully with natural materials. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Etching, Neutral - Roller Blind
products.description: When you take a look at the intricate finish of etching neutral you come to appreciate just how much work has gone into creating such a nuanced design. The lines are not crisp, and yet they still catch the eye. It's the added layer of depth that will refine your decor and take things in an exciting new direction. Taking your time is what their etching range is all about. Add it to the bathroom for that dreamy and relaxing space that will allow you to switch off the moment you step inside.

products.title: Summer Trail, Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: Summer trail pastel combines contemporary colours with country chic to create a fabric that you'll instantly fall in love with. The beauty lies in the simplicity with which the intricate florals adorn the finely woven canvas. Just what you need to lose yourself in the moment. When you want to create a theme that brings your space to life, it's all about celebrating authenticity. Use natural textures like hessian, slate, and bare wood to create a lived in space that instantly welcomes you to put your feet up and take it easy.

products.title: Kite, Cloud - Roller Blind
products.description: When you take a look at the quaint and homely pattern of kite cloud, you get that feeling of being ready to put your feet up and get comfy. The playful shapes scatter themselves across the fabric, whilst the light grey background instantly sets your mind at ease. We love the idea of pairing cloud with a light laminate floor and some cream leather couches. That way you can introduce plenty of light colour contrasts in the living room without having to reach for your paintbrushes.

products.title: Mulberry, Neutral - Roller Blind
products.description: Mulberry neutral gives you a starting point from which you can set the tone for your new decor. The relaxed and homely aesthetic is perfect when you want to add that warm and cosy feeling to any space your heart desires. Adding homely touches like slate coasters, logs by the fire, and jars of warm white fairy lights is a great direction to go in. Adding things just because you love the way they look is the name of the game here.

products.title: Romance, Breeze - Roller Blind
products.description: Pastel blues and indigo-greys are the stars of the show in the floral, ultra-pretty romance breeze, a durable yet lightweight blind that allows just enough light to filter through, whilst still offering privacy and shade. Set the breeze against cool blue bedroom walls and bring out the indigo with occasional furnishings and accessories. Or instead, give your utility or hallway a delicate pop of colour to add interest to magnolia or cream walls.

products.title: Florence, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of florence coral is that it allows you to see something subtly different every time you look at it. There are so many different shades of green and pink working together, that you really get the feel that the fabric has a life and soul all of its own. When you want to work coral into your decor, you need to be bold with your use of shape and form. Striking country artwork that immediately catches the eye, and a rug in front of the log burner would make for welcome additions.

products.title: Romance, Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: Olive greens and berry purples make up the floral pattern of the romance haze, which is a classic yet contemporary light-filtering blind. The lightweight fabric is moved up and down to your liking by an easy-to-use roller mechanism, and is durable and long-lasting in quality. The haze will sit pretty in any romantic, country bedroom, and is best complemented by creams and lilacs. Alternatively, sit against olive green, shaker-style units in a kitchen, where it will work with both rustic dcor and modern appliances.

products.title: Kite, Sunburst - Roller Blind
products.description: Kite sunburst is one of those playful patterns that adds a homely touch to your space, no matter where you decide to use it. The triangles scatter across the sunny fabric, and give it a relaxed vibe that can be rather hard to find with patterned designs. For a look you'll love the moment you walk in the door, contrast sunburst against some soft aqua blue walls and a white rug. That way you can introduce natural calming shades and hues into the bedroom, and fall asleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

products.title: Watercolour, Mango - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and admire watercolour mango, you come to appreciate the artisan skill that goes into created such a design. The fabric is dominated by subtle variations of blacks, greys, and whites, and yet it's the splash of mango that stands out from across the room. When you want to be able to introduce something a little different into your home, the upstairs landing is often the place to do it.

products.title: Florence, Mustard - Roller Blind
products.description: Florence mustard gets its name from the tangy yellow that sits in the background, but this is a design that offers far more than that. The artistic nature of the florals gives the fabric a beautiful sketched quality that instantly captures the imagination. Imagine all of the new creative avenues this opens up for your next home interiors project. If you want to be able to start the day with a smile, use mustard in the bedroom.

products.title: Summer Trail, Blossom - Roller Blind
products.description: Summer trail blossom is the finishing touch to one of their most popular ranges, and the selection of country chic colours are the reason we consider it one of their jewels in the crown. There are so many exciting creative avenues that open up to you that it'll be hard to know which one to explore first. Crisp blues and light mint greens will work in perfect harmony with blossom to create a look that will live long in the memory.
